/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top left corner. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. In the distance, majestic mountains rise against the sky, their peaks obscured by a light haze. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the view. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and bushes contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
